name: Tsarina Leather Cap & Fur Earflaps in Black Sheepskin
description:
Real leather and sheepskin shearling combine in this luxurious winter hat with its elegant dome of a crown and heavenly soft fur earflap.
The earflaps could be worn up or down.

Leopard print fleece lining for added warmth. 

Available in sizes Small, Medium, and Large: 22"-24" (56-62 cm).
Professional dry clean only.

Free domestic shipping.

name: Tsarina Leather Cap With Fur Earflaps in  Brown Leopard
description:
Real leather and rabbit fur combine in this luxurious winter hat with its elegant dome of a crown and a heavenly soft fur ear flap.
The earflaps could be worn up or down.

Leopard print fleece lining for added warmth. Please note that the leopard print of the fur varies slightly from piece to piece.

Available in sizes Small, Medium, and Large: 22"-24" (56-62 cm).
Professional dry clean only.

Free domestic shipping.

name: Sweet Softness Cloche in Wine Cashmere Knit
description:
As soft and fuzzy as your favorite cashmere hat, this little sweetie feels weightless on your head, does not ruin your hairstyle and keeps you warm through the chill of a winter day. 

Luxurious double layered cashmere/ mohair knit with velvet bow, organza and velvet leaves, and marabou feather trim. Wired brim, elastic velvet ribbon. 

Doubled for lining. Available in sizes Small, Medium, and Large: 22-24"(56-62cm). 
 Dry clean only.

Color: Wine

Dry clean only

Free domestic shipping

name: French Encounter Beret in Black Sequined Wool Knit
description:
Classic beret style goes glam with wide band and sequined embroidery. Accented with a nature-lover’s leaf branch and marabou feathers.

 Made of  weighty wool gently shimmering with tone - on - tone palettes, this hat is great for outdoor partying on even the coldest nights.
Soft and packable, made of over-embroidered knit.

 Fully lined. 

 Available in sizes: Small, Medium, and Large: 22-24"(56 -60 cm).  

Dry clean only.

Color: Black Shine

Free domestic shipping.

name: Cherry Blossom Corduroy Cap, Black Coffee
description:
Made of plush cotton corduroy, this cap is remarkably soft and never gets out of shape or goes out of style.

Its elegant elongated shape with a tiny visor complements your face.

A puffy velvet flower with a touch of fur in the middle is furnished with pin back for easy on and off.

It has a cheerful pastel plaid lining in lightweight cotton chambray. A silky elastic band adds a gentle stretch to the crown.

Available in soft and stretchy sizes Small, Medium, and Large ( head sizes 22"- 24", 54-62 cm).

Dry clean or hand wash. Remove flower before washing.

Color: Black Coffee

Free domestic shipping.

name: Shimmering Bow Cloche in Black &  Gold Wool Knit
description:
Look like a classy mid-century flapper girl.

 A style statement with the added benefit of coziness, this hat is remarkably soft and packable. Yet, it works as your most elegant topper again and again. 

Textured knit hat with a brim, made of fine blend of acrylic, wool and gold metallic.

Fully lined. Wired brim. 
Available in sizes Small, Medium, Large: 22-24" (56 -60 cm).  
Color: Black/ Gold

Free domestic shipping.

name: Pompom Bell Beanie in Winter White Wool Knit
description:
Bell shaped and seamlessly smooth, this unique in its casual elegance hat is topped with colorful faux fur pompom.  

 Made of stretchy wool jersey, with hidden elastic on the inside of the crown.

 Fully lined, with wired brim.
Available in sizes Small and Medium: 22-23 1/2" (55 - 58 cm). 

Dry clean or hand wash.

Color: Winter White

name: Chess Master's Cloche in Grey Felted Wool Knit
description:
Diamond shapes in black and gray form an intricate pattern on this warming hat. 
Styling combines comfort and ease of a knit beanie and refined elegance of a cloche.

 Made of felted wool knit with a wired brim, it is decorated with fine stretch velvet ribbon and a matching bow.

 Fully lined, knit hat with brim. 
 Available in sizes Small, Medium, and Large: 22-24" (56 -60 cm). 
Dry clean or gentle hand wash.

Free domestic shipping.

name: Royal Guard Furry Cap in Grey Faux Fur and Tweed
description:
This striking hat is a fun imitation of the famous uniform.

It looks cute on girls of all ages. It keeps you warm through the frosty winter, or adds an elegant touch to your ski trips.

Salt and pepper tweed visor is topped with a bushy silver gray faux fur. 

Available in soft and stretchy sizes Small, Medium, and Large (22"-24", 55-64 cm).

Dry clean only.

Color: Silver Fur  

Free domestic shipping.

name: Country Diva Rose Cap in Black Polka Dot
description:
Sweet duo of roses makes this elegant cap feel like a celebrity. Cheers up a breezy day with the fun dot print. Soft wool blend knit, with handmade roses. 
Styling combines a slouchy top of a classic newsboy cap with the fitted brim of a cloche hat.

Fully lined. Available in sizes Small, Medium, and Large: 22-24"(56-62cm).
 
Dry clean or hand wash.

Color:  Black/Cream Polka Dot

Free domestic shipping.

name: Follow Me Beanie Cap in Cream Knit & Rabbit Fur
description:
A great ski bunny’s companion, this cap offers warmth and comfort with a chunky soft knit and elastic in the back.  Playful fur fringe at the crown sets the mood for a race.
Inspired by a classic Mohawk hat.

Wool and alpaca blend, rabbit fur trim. Fully lined. Available in sizes Small, Medium, and Large: 22-24" (56-62cm).
 Dry clean only. 

 Color: Cream Flame

Free domestic shipping.

name: Brainy Guy Beanie in Black Cashmere Knit
description:
Treat your large headed self with this roomy hat.

Problem solved: a soft warm winter hat that folds flat for travel. It has a flap that unfolds for a stormy day. Tiny "brainy" label on the side announces the obvious.

Made of soft cashmere, with thin nylon lining.
Available in soft and stretchy sizes Medium, Large, and Extra Large: 22"-25"( 56-64 cm).

Dry clean or hand wash.

Color: Black.

Free domestic shipping.

description:
Turn any rainy day into an opportunity to flaunt your style. 

This waterproof little cap has a textured patent finish on the outside and cute check lining inside. A removable bow could be pinned on either side of the visor.

Black vinyl coated waterproof fabric, cotton lining, elastic back. 
Fits head sizes Small, Medium, and Large: 22-24"(56-62cm). 

Dry clean or hand wash.

Color: Black Patent

Free domestic shipping

name: Rain or Shine Bucket Hat, Grey Cotton Denim
description:
Casual denim and elegant shape make this soft and stretchy hat an irresistible choice for Fall. 
 Tall crown with graceful fitted brim are complemented with matching top stitching.

Made of stretch cotton denim, with fun polka dot lining.
Partially lined, with elastic band at the base of crown.

Available in soft and stretchy sizes Small, Medium, and Large: head sizes 22”-24”, or 54-62 cm.

Hand wash or gentle machine wash. 

Free domestic shipping.

Turn a rainy day into an opportunity to flaunt your style. 

Waterproof little cap has a subtle gold finish outside and cute check lining inside. Gathered band with a pleated bow accents the front.

Antique gold vinyl coated fabric, cotton lining, elastic back. Available in sizes Small, Medium, and Large: 22"-24"(56-62cm)


Dry clean or hand wash.

Made of medium weight cotton jersey, with Lycra for stretch. Fully lined with thin cotton lining, with elastic band at the base of crown.

Available in soft and stretchy sizes Small, Medium, and Large: head sizes 22”-24”, or 54-62 cm.

 Comes handy on a rainy day, just as often as on a bright afternoon. Perfect for those days when the summer is almost gone, and the fall is around the corner.

Medium weight cotton denim is only partly lined for shape and support, with a firm visor. Checkered cotton lining, with soft elastic at the base of the crown. 

Available in soft and stretchy sizes Small, Medium, and Large ( 22"-24", 54 -62cm).

Color: Army Green

On those early days of fall when the chill is just starting to settle, try our topless topper. More than just a headband, it adds a touch of elegance with a charming bow to any outfit you wear.
 
Made of the softest stretch wool and elastic ribbon, it is nostalgic and mod at the same time.

 Packable and low maintenance, it is going to be your daily companion through the longest part of the year. Wool blend knit, rayon grosgrain ribbon.

Available in sizes Small and Medium: 21-22"(54-57cm). 
Dry clean or hand wash.

Free domestic shipping.

 Color: Black and White Plaid

 Camouflage print re-imagined as a scaly snakeskin sets the mood for a fine day of hiking. Weightless in a cotton knit, this original newsboy cap has a playful double pointed rear (or is it an ear?).

 Flaunt the flower on the side for Easter,  re-pin to the folded brim at the front for a casual garden party, wear backwards for a day at the beach. 
Many looks and options in one adorable mod hat. It is fully reversible, too.

Wide brim fully covers your face when turned down. The contrasting lining looks charming with the brim turned up.

100% cotton materials, with hidden elastic band around the crown, and adjustable ties in back. Star accents. Wired brim for shape retention. Removable flower pin.

Available in soft and stretchy sizes Small, Medium, and Large: head sizes 22”-24”, or 54-62 cm.

Free domestic shipping.

 Available in soft and stretchy sizes Small, Medium, and Large: head sizes 22”-24”, or 54-62 cm.

name: Silver Wedding Bridal Fascinator with Rhinestone Drops
description:
An amazing bridal accessory, this headdress is mounted on a soft but sturdy plastic headband.

A sensual combination of colors and textures frames the bride's face with delicate veiling and sheer organza roses. The raindrops of rhinestones trickle gently down on one side.

This fascinator combines a pair of white and silver organza roses, silver metallic French  veiling, marabou feathers in white and iridescent pearl, and rhinestone and silver chains that move gracefully on one side.

It works well with all hair styles and is very easy to wear. The setting is firm and sturdy: guaranteed to hold up through the night of rigorous dancing.

One size fits most.

Store in a cool dry place.

Free domestic shipping.

name: Roses Are Red Hair Barette with Feathers and French Veil

A sensual combination of flowers and feathers sets the mood for a glamorous evening.

This fascinator combines a pair of  red silk roses, red French birdcage veiling, and red marabou feathers.

It works well with all hair styles and could turn your basic little black dress into a couture presentation. Looks great as a side accent as pictured, or holding up a pony tail.

One size.

Store in a cool dry place.

Also available in  white, cream, silver, and black by special order at the same price.

Free domestic shipping.
